mapper.insert: INSERT INTO route_sections (departure_station_id, destination_station_id, minutes, zone_name) VALUES (#{departureStation.id}, #{destinationStation.id}, #{minutes}, #{zone.name});
mapper.sql: rs.id AS route_section_id, rs.departure_station_id AS route_section_departure_station_id, rs.destination_station_id AS route_section_destination_station_id, rs.minutes AS route_section_minutes, rs.zone_name AS route_section_zone_name
route_sections rs LEFT JOIN stations dep ON rs.departure_station_id = dep.id LEFT JOIN stations dest ON rs.destination_station_id = dest.id LEFT JOIN zones z ON rs.zone_name = z.name
